Description: Hematite scarab, chipped at front, elytra marked, longitudinally pierced, base inscribed with hieroglyphs naming the follower Amenemhat, and the nefer sign.
Curator's comments: A fake based on EA 67811 (K Ryholt, pers. comm). To be published by K. Ryholt.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge (?)
